languages.text: Абеляр Версериан, став свидетелем чудовищного "вознесения" свое{mf|го|й} госпо{mf|дина|жи}, возглавил безуспешную попытку уничтожения Осколка К'тан. Он умер с именем Теодоры на устах — не полагая более, что {name} фон Валанциус досто{mf|ин|йна} зваться его Лорд-капитаном, он посвятил свой последний отчаянный подвиг той, перед кем всегда преклонялся.

Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.
languages.original_text: Абеляр Версериан, став свидетелем чудовищного "вознесения" свое{mf|го|й} госпо{mf|дина|жи}, возглавил безуспешную попытку уничтожения Осколка К'тан. Он умер с именем Теодоры на устах — не полагая более, что {name} фон Валанциус досто{mf|ин|йна} зваться его Лорд-капитаном, он посвятил свой последний отчаянный подвиг той, перед кем всегда преклонялся.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian witnessed a monstrous ascension of his {mf|lord|lady}, and lead the futile attempt to destroy the C'Tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips. He no longer deemed {name} von Valancius to be worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one who he revered all of his life.

Abelard Werserian witnessed a monstrous ascension of his {mf|lord|lady}, and lead the futile attempt to destroy the C'Tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips. He no longer deemed {name} von Valancius to be worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one who he revered all of his life.

Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and lead the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and lead the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森在亲眼目睹了行商浪人恐怖的“擢升”之后，他亲自领导着接下来的战斗，徒劳地试图摧毁星神碎片。他临死时，嘴边念叨着西奥多拉的名字。他不再认为{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯有资格作为他的领主舰长，因此，他将这最后的绝望之举献给了他一生最尊敬的人。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

traits.locale_text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森在亲眼目睹了行商浪人恐怖的“擢升”之后，他亲自领导着接下来的战斗，徒劳地试图摧毁星神碎片。他临死时，嘴边念叨着西奥多拉的名字。他不再认为{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯有资格作为他的领主舰长，因此，他将这最后的绝望之举献给了他一生最尊敬的人。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian erlebte den monströsen "Aufstieg" {mf|seines Lords|seiner Lady} und führte den vergeblichen Versuch an, das C'tan-Fragment zu zerstören. Er starb mit Theodoras Namen auf den Lippen, denn er sah in {name} von Valancius keinen würdigen Lord Captain mehr. Seinen letzten verzweifelten Akt widmete er der Frau, die er sein ganzes Leben lang verehrt hatte.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian erlebte den monströsen "Aufstieg" {mf|seines Lords|seiner Lady} und führte den vergeblichen Versuch an, das C'tan-Fragment zu zerstören. Er starb mit Theodoras Namen auf den Lippen, denn er sah in {name} von Valancius keinen würdigen Lord Captain mehr. Seinen letzten verzweifelten Akt widmete er der Frau, die er sein ganzes Leben lang verehrt hatte.

languages.text: Abélard Werserian assista à la monstrueuse « ascension » {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et fut chargé de l'impossible objectif de détruire l'Écharde C'tan. Jugeant {name} von Valancius indigne de demeurer {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}, il dédia son ultime acte de désespoir à celle qu'il avait vénérée toute sa vie durant et mourut en prononçant le nom de Théodora.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

traits.locale_text: Abélard Werserian assista à la monstrueuse « ascension » {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et fut chargé de la vaine tentative de détruire l’Écharde C'tan. Jugeant {name} von Valancius indigne de demeurer {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine}, il dédia son ultime acte de désespoir à celle qu'il avait vénérée toute sa vie durant et mourut en prononçant le nom de Théodora.

languages.text: Abelard Werserian fue testigo de la monstruosa «ascensión» de su señor{mf||a} y lideró los vanos intentos de destruir el fragmento de C'tan. Murió con el nombre de Theodora en los labios: cuando dejó de considerar a {name} von Valancius dign{mf|o|a} de ser su Lord Capitán, dedicó su último acto desesperado a la persona a la que había admirado durante toda su vida.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian fue testigo de la monstruosa «ascensión» de su señor{mf||a} y lideró los vanos intentos de destruir el fragmento de C'tan. Murió con el nombre de Theodora en los labios: cuando dejó de considerar a {name} von Valancius dign{mf|o|a} de ser su Lord Capitán, dedicó su último acto desesperado a la persona a la que había admirado durante toda su vida.

languages.text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは、主の奇怪な「即位」を見届け、ク＝タン・シャードを滅ぼすという無益な試みを先導した。今際の際に、彼はシオドーラの名を口にした。アベラルドにとって{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスはもはやロード・キャプテンの器ではなかったのだ。それ故に力を振り絞った最期の行為を、生涯を通し崇めつづけてきたその人へ捧げたのだった。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

traits.locale_text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは、主の奇怪な「即位」を見届け、ク＝タン・シャードを滅ぼすという無益な試みを先導した。今際の際に、彼はシオドーラの名を口にした。アベラルドにとって{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスはもはやロード・キャプテンの器ではなかったのだ。それ故に力を振り絞った最期の行為を、生涯を通し崇めつづけてきたその人へ捧げたのだった。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian, {mf|lordunun|leydisinin} korkunç "miracına" şahit oldu ve C'tan Parçası'nı yok etmek için nafile bir çaba içine girdi. Öldüğünde dudaklarından Theodora'nın adı dökülüyordu, {name} von Valancius'u artık Lord Kaptan olmaya layık görmüyordu. O son, ümitsiz anını, tüm hayatı boyunca saygı duyduğu kişiye adadı.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian witnessed the monstrous "ascension" of his {mf|lord|lady} and led the futile attempt to destroy the C'tan Shard. He died with Theodora's name on his lips — no longer deeming {name} von Valancius worthy of being his Lord Captain, he devoted his last desperate act to the one he had revered all his life.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian, {mf|lordunun|leydisinin} korkunç "miracına" şahit oldu ve C'tan Parçası'nı yok etmek için nafile bir çaba içine girdi. Öldüğünde dudaklarından Theodora'nın adı dökülüyordu. {name} von Valancius'u artık Lord Kaptan'ı olmaya layık görmüyordu ve o son, ümitsiz anını, tüm hayatı boyunca saygı duyduğu kişiye adadı.
